snippet: Odyssey Works creates an elaborate 36-hour performance for and about an audience of one, after months of detailed study of that person.
abstract: Odyssey Works creates elaborate 36-hour performances that invert art's longstanding arrangement with the audience; rather than a single artist creating for a large audience, the loose-knit, multidisciplinary collective directs its members to create weekend-long performances for a single chosen subject.
lead_paragraph: Odyssey Works creates an elaborate 36-hour performance for and about an audience of one, after months of detailed study of that person.
